website_summaries.verdict: The Epson PictureMate Pal's feature set and quality will keep casual users happy with its good quality, fast prints, and convenience.

customer_reviews.title: thought i was buying new
customer_reviews.text: I was not aware it was used . tried it and it does not print. I ordered new ink cartridge and will try it again. if it still does not work I will be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Larry B.

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly
customer_reviews.text: This Photo Printer replaces an old Kodak printer dock that died after many years and thousands of photos. I wanted a printer that would do 4X6 photos. I'm very pleased with the Epson PictureMatePal. It works easily. I like it better than my old printer, especially that it closes up when not in use to protect it from dust and dog hairs.
customer_reviews.author: schimmel1885

customer_reviews.title: TexasCustomer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boss for Christmas. He LOVES it! I have one and I absoulutely love mine, so I thought I would spread the joy! This is a great product. It is small, and very portable. 5 stars from me!
customer_reviews.author: TexasCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Epson PictureMate Pal
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find this Epson PictureMate Pal, as the one my husband gave me many years ago wore out from all my use. I love to be able to print the pictures I take at home and the quality of print is very good!
customer_reviews.author: Chris K

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE ITEM I RECEIVED
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRINTER IF YOU GET THE LAST MODELS!!!! NOT THE ITEM I RECEIVED I have had at least five of these GREAT Epson printers. The model I received was perhaps the first one ever made...no features, no red-eye out, no visual on the screen....a complete waste of money. Mispresented, However, the wonderful people at AMAZON credited my account to my complete surprise and satisfaction. Thank you!!! Steve
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE PRINTER
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRINTER IS SO EASY TO OPERATE AND CREATE WITH. THE COLOR ON THE PICTURES IS WONDERFUL.
customer_reviews.author: Donna R. Gillmore

customer_reviews.title: A great printer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little printer. The size is appealing, and it's easy transportable (with a convenient carry-handle on top). Unfortunately it does not have a battery, so it must still be plugged in. I really like the fact that the ink and paper are purchased together, and the quantities of both seem to line up fairly well, so I'm not running out of one or the other at different times. As far as the ink goes, I'm not sure what the other reviewer is talking about, because, according to Epson, even the different kind of ink this printer uses is still archival quality. I think the picture quality is good for the price of this machine.
customer_reviews.author: vincent_anton

customer_reviews.title: Who said small is not good!!!???
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the pictures is great. But you need to remember to enhance details on the settings when you print, while this will take on more ink, that is ok, the quality is perfect. Colors are bright and exact, while printing RGB format. It feels like the pictures are clone from the screen. I recomend this product to anybody that needs to create their own family album and not wait until the store developers have it ready. Also for postcards and invitations, where you dont want large quantities.
customer_reviews.author: Yi

customer_reviews.title: Epson PM 240 Picture Mate
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, one for a gift. Very good quality photos. Fast printing. The LCD screen is too small and you can't zoom in to see if you need to edit more before prining (w/out a computer). With a computer, no problem; but the software package for photo editting leaves something to be desired. Sometimes the red-eye reduction needs to be undone. The photo managing is not always easy and intuitive. Overall, I love this printer and recommend it for the price, quality, and cheap recurring costs of printing.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Epson Picture Mate 200
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer to do quality 4x6 prints both cheaply and quickly. The quality is good and it prints relatively fast. Print cost is about $0.31/per print. This isn't very cheap in my extimation...... I only needed something simple since I edit all my photos on my computer prior to printing. The unit is fairly new, so I can't speak for it's durability, by so far I have no major complaints, and I would by this printer again.
customer_reviews.author: JD Binford

customer_reviews.title: Great photo printer for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great printer. I compared the print quality with a more expensive HP printer and basically there was not much a difference. So I chose this printer and it has been great. I would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gambrell

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HANDY MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: GOT THIS FOR MY TEENAGE GRANDDAUGHTS FOR CHRISTMAS THEY LOVE IT SAYS IT IS SO EASY TO USE . NICE PICTURES!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Swartz

product_meta.title: Epson PictureMate Pal (PM 200) 4x6 Photo Printer
product_meta.description:
Get brilliant, pro quality photos at the touch of a button! With PictureMate Pal, it's easy to print 4x6 photos directly from your memory card, camera or phone ¿ PC-free. The 2-inch, premium photo viewer means you can view and select the photos you want to print ¿ anytime, anywhere. Get beautiful, fade resistant prints the last for generations ¿ all at an everyday, low print price

AMAZON.COM
Amazon.com PictureMate Pal is the fast, easy way to get brilliant photos with rich color, sharp detail and true-to-life skin tones that are made to last. Use the 2-inch, premium photo viewer to view and select your favorite shots. Then, print stacks of pro quality, 4x6 photos yourself, right at home--all with just one touch.

 



Print your photos, your way with the PictureMate Pal. It's fun, easy-to-use features, and best of all it's PC-free. View larger. 

Use the adjustable, 2-inch, premium photo viewer to select and edit images from memory cards, digital cameras, and mobile phones. View larger. 

It's compact size and handle makes it a Snap to take this PictureMate with you on your next trip or family reunion. View larger. PictureMate Pal supports all popular memory cards. And, you can even print from your digital camera or mobile phone. Whatever you choose to print, you’ll get amazing, borderless photos in up to 60 seconds1. Do it all with or without ever turning on your computer. Best of all, it always delivers beautiful prints that last generations, and longer than traditional, film-processed photos. In fact, each print is smudge, scratch, water and fade resistant for convenient, worry-free handling.

 PictureMate Pal is the perfect way to share all your precious memories. Print all your favorite photos at an everyday, low print price. Each PictureMate PrintPack contains everything you need, including both the photo cartridge and photo paper. There are even matte and glossy photo paperoptions. So, trust your memories to PictureMate--it’s the anytime, anywhere photo printer that anyone can use!

 Features and Benefits 

 Pro quality, 4x6 photos you can print yourself


 * Print photos, on glossy or matte photo paper 
 * Get brilliant photos with one touch--in up to 60 seconds1 

Easy-to-use features
 * Enjoy simple, one-touch printing for true BorderFree, 4x6 photos--no computer required! 
 * View and select photos before printing with the 2-inch, premium photo viewer 
 * Print true borderless, classic border, wallet, mini wallet and proof sheet layouts 

Long-lasting results
 * Print photos that last generations, and longer than traditional, film-processed photos 
 * Share photos so durable, they’re smudge, scratch, water and fade resistant for worry-free handling 

Affordable, convenient home printing
 * Print stacks of beautiful photos at an everyday, low print price--satisfaction guaranteed 
 * Pick up a Print Pack and get everything you need for beautiful, 4x6 photos (Each pack includes both a photo cartridge and photo paper.) 

Complete compatibility
 * Print directly from your memory card, digital camera or mobile phone 
 * Use PictureMate Pal with or without your PC or Macintosh 

1. Color photo without a PC in border layout, measured from start of paper feed. Additional print time will vary based on system configuration, software application and page complexity.  What's in the box
PictureMate Pal printer, power cord, ink cartridge, and Arcsoft PhotoImpression (PC and Macintosh compatible and Exif Print-enabled) additional Disney frames provided on CD
feature_bullets: View, edit and print brilliant 4x6" photos - without a PC!
Compatible with all popular memory cards and camera phones with PictBridge or Bluetooth* adaptor.
Print smudge, scratch, water and fade resistant photos you'll be proud to share.
Beautiful glossy or matte prints last generations longer than traditional film-processed photos.
Print stacks of lab quality photos at an everyday low price -- it's an unbeatable value for superior photos
